entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story. He is described as glancing back and thinking about their actions.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend of Harry's who disguised herself as Bellatrix. She is mentioned as shrieking something after the cart crash.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: A Death Eater whose wand was stolen. Hermione disguised herself as her.

entities.name: griphook
entities.description: A goblin who shouted 'No!' before the cart crashed.

entities.name: gringotts
entities.description: A bank in the wizarding world where Harry and his friends went. It is described as having deeper passages than they had ever seen.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of dark wizards who knew about Hermione's disguise.

relationships.description: Harry and his friends visited Gringotts bank.
The Death Eaters knew about the stolen wand.
